org.sd.text
Interface PatternFinder

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractPatternFinder, NumberFinder, TermFinder
public interface PatternFinder

Interface for finding patterns in text.

Author:
Spence Koehler

findPatternPos

int[] findPatternPos(java.lang.String input,
                     int acceptPartial)
Find the position of a pattern within the (normalized) input.

Returns:
an array with the normalized index of the first substring to match (at index 0), and its normalized length (at index 1) or null.

findPattern

java.lang.String findPattern(java.lang.String input,
                             int acceptPartial)
Find the non-normalized text matching a pattern within the input.

Returns:
the matching non-normalized text or null if there is no pattern found.

                     int fromPos,

Find a pattern between the fromPos (inclusive) and the toPos (exclusive).

Returns:
an array with the normalized index of the first substring to match (at index 0), and its normalized length (at index 1) or null.
